title: Premier Mark McGowan announces WA's borders will be closed from midnight Sunday, April 5.
description: The WA Government will become an "island within an island", closing its interstate border effective from midnight on Sunday, with the WA Premier saying the state's isolation was its best defence against COVID‑19.
content:
Posted 
April 02, 2020 19:50:22
The WA Government will become an "island within an island", closing its interstate border effective from midnight on Sunday, with the WA Premier saying the state's isolation was its best defence against COVID19.
Source: ABC … [+94 chars]
